message.body: I told her this was home got into the Austin lesbian and gay film fest! Yay!
Always thankful for all your work on it!
YAYAYAYAY! Hooray! That's fantastic news!
Are you going to attend??
I wish - it right after my two week vacation :( it is tempting - I can think about it but it would be a lot of traveling - I need to see what the flights are like
I get 2 access passes if you want to go
Extended vacationzzz!
Yeah - just keep it going!
Is it in the fall?
Sept 11-14 or something like that
I'll look again.
Vacation forever! I wish I could go. So much travel in the fall lined up already.
But huge congrats
Thanks!
Do you know anyone at the university city arts league? Hunter has an interview there this week.
I do! What did he interview for?
He has an interview on Thursday to teach an adobe class for visual artists and illustrator
He can mention my name - if he interviews with Noreen she loves me
I mop there and take ceramics if he needs to look like he knows me better
Haha awesome. It's always a help to know someone who knows someone. Thanks!!!
No problem
